page.title: 08Sports
page.content: The{sports}in our area are mainly{ball {sports.}In school we have{rugby}every Wednesday in the winter.At the start of the{rugby season}and at the end we have a{tournament.}In the summer we have{cricket.}We play in another local school,we haved played many games,I think we have only won one against Llangadog but it is good fun.Every summer we have our{school sports}in {Llanwrda,Llandovery}or{Llangadog school.The events are the{obstacle {race,egg}and{spoon race,flat race, {spoke race,skipping race,sack race, {potatoe race,relay}and the{long {distance.}We usaly start practising for the sports a long time before sports day,this year 1985 we didn't have so much time but we gained more medals than in 1984 and 1983.In 1984 we had{26}this year we had{36 ribbons.
